Dear All Members,

Please exercise common courtesy on this list and provide=
 constructive
for art, fiction or multi-media shared by fellow members here=
.  I do
now realize that "l17842" is a Shinsengumi fan and perhaps yaoi
mat=
erial maybe offensive to this individual.  The image shared in my
post was =
completely rated-G.  From now on, on the subject line I will
type [Yaoi] so=
 that people who dislike this sort of material can avoid
the message entire=
ly.  So I do take responsibility for my post and
suggest anyone else who wi=
shes to share the art/fiction/multimedia to
continue to post  here without =
any worries given they provide the
appropriate warning.

Ofcourse, this lis=
t is for -all- genres, not just yaoi.  
Any Shinsengumi fan would know thou=
gh, that yaoi has long since been
part of the fandom for many, many years a=
nd it started in Japan.  So
if you dislike it---just avoid it.  No need to =
be mean about it.

Thanks,
